attributes.action: Make masks and face coverings illegal and demonstration and protests
attributes.additional_details:
Since the end of covid, protestors have been using masks and face coverings to hide from facial recognition systems and to wilfully avoid the law, this is a deliberate attempt to subvert security systems and to gain anonymity to behave as they want.
There is no rules in force that mean these people have to wear a mask, and attending a demo/protest with 1000's of other people nullify's the health concern.
attributes.background: Id like a law passing that anyone trying to hide their identity or obscure themselves from surveillance/police, is immediately arrested and face a potential criminal charge under the breach of national security banner, or as hindering a police officer Police Act 1996, section 89(2).

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/704472
